comment: Nv mana group create chesi undakapothey manaki intha parichayam ayyedhi kaadhemo😭. I am so happy that we became jigidi dosth😁. Nee thingari veshalu anni miss avtha🤧. Docs edit cheyadam vachesindhi anukunta ga ika😌. Don't forget that I'll always be there for you. Saranghae😘
name: Lahari Poosarla

comment: Yaar, you are my first friend in this college. It was the best start I could have here♥️. Thanks for helping me so much during online semesters, and listening to all my nonsense🤗. Remember me and stay in touch!
name: Vandana Jha

comment: Project ra ala start ayindi mana parichayam 😅. I think you might be one of those who I might sometimes may be think like me. Neeto close lenu ani eppudu anipiyaledu ra. manam matladedi rare gane aina those unhinged talks,reels and music shares always special ra..Wish you the best in every aspect.
name: kanishka padamata

comment: Navya the sound system of our room😂.Kasi kuna of our gang🫣.Konchem ae vishyaniki aina aagam avadam maaneseyi.Lyrics ni thappu paadatamlo neeku nuve saati evaru raru pooti.I cherish every moment we spent together in clg life.I miss our deep discussions, gossips,sharing podcast&playlist.Aishiteru ❤️
name: Aishwarya Vasamshetty

comment: Miss youu daaa🥹🥹. Our foodie dates always end up the best but never with movie dates🤧. Ichina suggestion ni vaadadam nerchuuko naavs😏😏. Such a fluffyy teddy to huggiii. Do let me know before doing ur theeta panulu or you are gonna be a cry baby later. Lubb youuu navvuluuu💖💖🫂
name: Donga Yajna Madhuri

comment: Hey 🐥, asal 3rd year loo nuvu chesina theeta panulaki navvi navvi na bugalu poyevi asalu. Nuvu unav ante edo okati chesi akada fun create chesedanivi. Milky ela undi asalu.... Bangalore loo have fun create memories and take care of yourself. Will always miss the time we all had together, See you ❤️
name: Karthikeya Madishetty
